content.description: A summary of the Storymap that will be displayed on the same page as the storymap but not within the storymap itself.

map_type.description: A set of designations determined by the Unit. Equivalent to groupType for object groups

language.description: a string giving the two letter code for a language

tile_layer.description: A leaflet link to a visual style that the map can use. A list of these can be found at https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/.

tile_attribution.description: An acknowledgement given to the providers of the tile layer.

connect_markers.description: Draws a line between each marker determined by the order of each slide.

fullscreen_button.description: Allows the user to click a button that displays a fullscreen view of the map.

reset_button.description: Allows the user to click a button that resets the display of the map.

map_background_color.description: A hexidecimal string that lets the user determine the background color of the map.

url.description: A link to the Map's featured image.

thumbnail.description: A link to a thumbnail for the map's featured image.

alt.description: A short description of the image (Required for 508 compliance).

description.description: A short discription of the storymap. This is used when sharing the record on social media. It is limited to 250 characters.

items.description: the EDAN-ID of each slide belonging to the storymap. The order determines the games.
